meat.title: Beef Sirloin
meat.short_description: Lean, flavorful cut, great for grilling or pan-searing.

meat.title: Chicken Thighs
meat.short_description: Juicy dark meat, budget-friendly and perfect for roasting or stewing.

meat.title: Pork Tenderloin
meat.short_description: Versatile, lean, and quick-cooking cut of pork.

meat.title: Lamb Chops
meat.short_description: Tender and rich cut, often seasoned with rosemary and garlic.

meat.title: Ground Turkey
meat.short_description: A low-fat substitute for ground beef in many recipes.

meat.title: Bacon (Sliced)
meat.short_description: Cured pork belly, known for its distinct salty and savory flavor.

meat.title: Prosciutto
meat.short_description: Dry-cured Italian ham, usually sliced thin and served raw.

meat.title: Veal Cutlets
meat.short_description: Thin slices of young cattle meat, excellent for quick pan-frying.

meat.title: Duck Breast
meat.short_description: Rich, fatty poultry cut that crisps up beautifully when pan-seared.

meat.title: T-Bone Steak
meat.short_description: A steak that includes both tenderloin and strip loin sections.

meat.title: Chorizo Sausage (Spanish)
meat.short_description: Highly seasoned pork sausage, cured or smoked, often spicy.

meat.title: Turkey Breast
meat.short_description: Very lean white meat, a staple for deli slices or holiday meals.

fish.title: Salmon Fillet
fish.short_description: Rich in Omega-3s, excellent for baking or pan-searing.

fish.title: Albacore Tuna
fish.short_description: Firm, white meat fish, highly valued for its mild flavor.

fish.title: Cod Loin
fish.short_description: Flaky, mild white fish, often used in fish and chips or chowder.

fish.title: Tilapia
fish.short_description: Inexpensive, mild-flavored freshwater fish that's easy to cook.

fish.title: Mackerel
fish.short_description: Strongly flavored, oily fish packed with nutrients.

fish.title: Haddock
fish.short_description: White fish similar to cod, known for its slightly sweeter flavor.

fish.title: Halibut
fish.short_description: Large flatfish with firm, white, dense meat, excellent for grilling.

fish.title: Trout (Rainbow)
fish.short_description: Freshwater fish with a delicate flavor, often baked whole.

fish.title: Swordfish Steak
fish.short_description: Dense, meaty fish, popular for grilling due to its steak-like texture.

fish.title: Sardines (Canned)
fish.short_description: Small, oily fish packed with calcium and Omega-3s, often canned.

fish.title: Snapper (Red)
fish.short_description: Mild, slightly sweet white fish, great for roasting or frying.

fish.title: Perch
fish.short_description: Lean, flaky white fish, commonly found in freshwater lakes.

seasoning.title: Sea Salt
seasoning.short_description: Coarse crystals providing a clean, essential salty flavor.

seasoning.title: Black Pepper (Ground)
seasoning.short_description: The most universal spice, adds essential sharpness to any dish.

seasoning.title: Dried Oregano
seasoning.short_description: Aromatic herb essential for Mediterranean and Italian dishes.

seasoning.title: Smoked Paprika
seasoning.short_description: Adds a deep, smoky flavor and rich red color to meat and vegetables.

seasoning.title: Garlic Powder
seasoning.short_description: Convenient, concentrated dried garlic for adding a savory base.

seasoning.title: Cumin
seasoning.short_description: Earthy, nutty spice used extensively in Mexican, Indian, and Middle Eastern cuisine.

seasoning.title: Turmeric (Ground)
seasoning.short_description: Spice known for its vibrant yellow color and earthy, slightly bitter flavor.

seasoning.title: Basil (Dried)
seasoning.short_description: Sweet, aromatic herb, a key component in pesto and tomato sauces.

seasoning.title: Chili Powder
seasoning.short_description: A blend of dried chili peppers, cumin, and oregano, often used in Tex-Mex.

seasoning.title: Thyme (Dried)
seasoning.short_description: Subtle, slightly minty herb that pairs well with poultry and soups.

seasoning.title: Bay Leaves
seasoning.short_description: Aromatic leaves used to infuse broths, soups, and stews with flavor.

seasoning.title: Onion Powder
seasoning.short_description: Concentrated flavor of dried onion, adds a savory depth without moisture.

snack.title: Potato Chips
snack.short_description: Thinly sliced, fried potato crisp with various seasonings.

snack.title: Pretzels
snack.short_description: Crunchy, salted baked dough, great for dipping.

snack.title: Granola Bar
snack.short_description: Oats and grains bound with honey or syrup, good for quick energy.

snack.title: Mixed Nuts
snack.short_description: Assortment of almonds, walnuts, and cashews for a protein boost.

snack.title: Popcorn (Air-popped)
snack.short_description: Light and fluffy whole grain snack, often enjoyed at the movies.

snack.title: Yogurt Pretzels
snack.short_description: Pretzels coated in a sweet, tangy yogurt-flavored layer.

snack.title: Dried Apricots
snack.short_description: Chewy, naturally sweet dried fruit, rich in fiber.

snack.title: Rice Cakes
snack.short_description: Puffed rice shaped into a disk, a crunchy, low-calorie base for toppings.

snack.title: Trail Mix
snack.short_description: A blend of nuts, seeds, and dried fruit for hiking or travel.

snack.title: Cheese Crackers
snack.short_description: Savory, oven-baked crackers flavored with real cheese.

snack.title: Beef Jerky
snack.short_description: Lean strips of beef dried and cured, a high-protein portable snack.

snack.title: Edamame (Roasted)
snack.short_description: Soybeans in the pod, roasted and salted for a crunchy, healthy snack.

vegetable.title: Broccoli Florets
vegetable.short_description: Nutrient-rich green vegetable, great steamed or roasted.

vegetable.title: Carrots
vegetable.short_description: Crunchy root vegetable, high in Vitamin A, sweet when cooked.

vegetable.title: Spinach
vegetable.short_description: Leafy green, versatile for salads, smoothies, or sautéing.

vegetable.title: Sweet Potato
vegetable.short_description: Starchy, sweet root vegetable, popular as a side dish or fries.

vegetable.title: Bell Pepper (Red)
vegetable.short_description: Sweetest variety of bell pepper, excellent for salads or stuffing.

vegetable.title: Onion
vegetable.short_description: An essential aromatic bulb used as a base for almost all savory dishes.

vegetable.title: Zucchini
vegetable.short_description: Mild summer squash, great for grilling, baking, or spiralizing into noodles.

vegetable.title: Kale (Curly)
vegetable.short_description: Hardy, nutrient-dense leafy green, often massaged for salads.

vegetable.title: Asparagus
vegetable.short_description: Spring vegetable, popular roasted or grilled with a light snap.

vegetable.title: Mushroom (Cremini)
vegetable.short_description: Versatile brown mushrooms with an earthy flavor, excellent sautéed.

vegetable.title: Brussels Sprouts
vegetable.short_description: Small, crunchy cabbage-like vegetables, best roasted until crispy.

vegetable.title: Cauliflower
vegetable.short_description: Cruciferous vegetable often used as a rice or potato substitute.

seafood.title: Shrimp (Prawns)
seafood.short_description: Small crustaceans, quick to cook and versatile in many cuisines.

seafood.title: Crab Legs (Snow)
seafood.short_description: Sweet, delicate white meat, typically steamed and served with butter.

seafood.title: Mussels
seafood.short_description: Bivalve shellfish, often prepared by steaming in white wine sauce.

seafood.title: Clams (Littleneck)
seafood.short_description: Hard-shelled shellfish, a key ingredient in clam chowder.

seafood.title: Scallops (Sea)
seafood.short_description: Prized for their sweet, mild taste and tender texture, best seared quickly.

seafood.title: Lobster Tail
seafood.short_description: Highly prized shellfish known for its sweet, rich meat.

seafood.title: Oysters (Raw)
seafood.short_description: Bivalves often served on the half shell, delicate and briny.

seafood.title: Calamari (Squid)
seafood.short_description: Popular prepared fried or grilled, mild and slightly chewy meat.

seafood.title: King Prawns
seafood.short_description: Large variety of shrimp, great for skewers or curries.

seafood.title: Abalone
seafood.short_description: A mollusk known for its edible foot, considered a delicacy.

seafood.title: Sea Urchin (Uni)
seafood.short_description: A prized sushi ingredient, known for its rich, custardy texture.

seafood.title: Crawfish (Crayfish)
seafood.short_description: Small freshwater lobsters, a staple in Cajun and Creole cuisine.

fruit.title: Apple (Gala)
fruit.short_description: A sweet, crisp apple variety, ideal for snacking and baking.

fruit.title: Banana
fruit.short_description: Common tropical fruit, known for being a great source of potassium.

fruit.title: Orange (Navel)
fruit.short_description: A seedless and easy-to-peel citrus fruit.

fruit.title: Blueberries
fruit.short_description: Small, dark berries, rich in antioxidants, great for oatmeal or pancakes.

fruit.title: Avocado
fruit.short_description: Creamy, nutrient-dense fruit used in savory dishes like guacamole and salads.

fruit.title: Strawberry
fruit.short_description: Bright red, sweet and slightly tart berry, perfect for desserts.

fruit.title: Watermelon
fruit.short_description: Large, refreshing fruit with a high water content, ideal for summer.

fruit.title: Pineapple
fruit.short_description: Tropical fruit with a sweet, tangy flavor and fibrous texture.

fruit.title: Grapes (Red)
fruit.short_description: Sweet, small fruits that grow in bunches, great for snacking.

fruit.title: Lemon
fruit.short_description: Sour citrus fruit used primarily for its juice and zest.

fruit.title: Mango
fruit.short_description: Highly aromatic tropical fruit with a sweet, juicy pulp.

fruit.title: Kiwi
fruit.short_description: Small fruit with fuzzy brown skin and vibrant green flesh.
